roleset.name: very small
roleset.note: TINY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-seedcorpus. Comparison to 'small.01'. (from tiny.01-j)

role.descr: domain/specific aspect of arg1 that is tiny

example.name: arg1
example.text: The left accessory artery supplying the upper pole is tiny and does not enhance ; it is likely occluded .
example.arg: The left accessory artery supplying the upper pole

example.name: both args
example.text: She was tiny in stature, but a very strong and fiercely independent woman.
